The Catholic Church does need to change.  Some people say the Church is losing members. This is because the Church does not accept many things. For example, the Church does not accept gay marriage, abortion, or birth control. The Church has strong views on these things. But these views are old. If the Church changed to new ways of thinking, it would not lose members.

Some people disagree with the Church because of these views.  They think the Church has the wrong ideas.

For example, the Church is against abortion. If you want an abortion, you may not feel comfortable in the Church.


The same is true for gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you may not want to be in the Church. 

I think women should be priests. I also think priests should be allowed to marry.

I do not have a problem with gay marriage. I think people are born this way. I do not think it is a choice. 

I think it is wrong to say that a man and woman can marry, but two people of the same sex can not.  

I think people should not be punished for being gay. They are born this way. It is not their fault.

I think the government should not tell people who they can marry.  It is a personal decision.

Gay marriage should be legal. There is not a good reason to say no. Some people think gay couples are bad for families. But gay couples are different. They are not the same as straight couples. It is like two sides of a coin. They are different, but they are still the same. Gay couples have rights, like taxes and health care. If a person is sick, their partner can not be with them in the hospital. This is not fair. 

Many studies show gay couples are happy. They have strong relationships. Gay couples should have the same rights as straight couples. Gay people are not asking to marry in a church. They want a legal paper from the government. The government should not stop people from getting married because of religion.

Some people think gay couples should not adopt children. They worry about how children will grow up. But gay parents can be good parents. Gay children can grow up just like other children. Some schools have special classes for children of gay parents because they are bullied. This is wrong. 

The government should make gay marriage legal in all states. The government should not make laws based on religion. It is unfair to say that one religion is better than another. Some people believe gay people are sick. This is not true. The American Psychological Association says this is wrong. People should listen to experts, not to their friends or their church.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see drugs every day. Some drugs are illegal. This does not mean they are bad. Some drugs are good for people.

Many drugs are legal. They help people. They are not bad. These drugs are good medicine.  Marijuana is illegal. But it can help people too.

Some people say marijuana is bad. They say it is like alcohol. Alcohol is bad for people if they use too much. Marijuana can also be bad if people use too much.  

I think marijuana can be good medicine. People should not be afraid of it. People should learn more about marijuana. 

Marijuana is illegal. People think it is bad. But it is not as bad as other drugs. People should not be afraid of marijuana.

The church is different now. It is not as strict. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school and saw my friends there on the weekends. We would go to church together.

Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People dress more casually. In the summer, people come in their beach clothes. Families come in late.  

The morning masses are more casual, too. People wear jeans and khakis.

I do not know about the church’s politics. 

I do not think the church could have stopped bad things from happening. Some men who are married still do bad things. It is the person, not their marriage.

Some religions allow priests to get married. If someone wants to be married and follow their faith, they could choose a different religion.

I think people are born with their sexuality. It is not a choice. It is not fair to blame the church for people's actions. If the church knew about bad things and covered them up, that is wrong. But I do not think they knew in every case.

I was ok with the idea at first. But many people felt strong sadness after the September 11 attacks. I think the Bush group went into Iraq for a reason that was not good. They said Saddam Hussein had bad weapons and was bad for the world. They said he worked with the man who hurt America on September 11. This was not true.  This makes me angry.

I think the Bush group lied to the American people. Even Colin Powell, who spoke at the United Nations, now says he did not believe the information. This is wrong. It is wrong for the leaders to lie.

I think the Bush group does not care about the rules of our country. They want to be in control. They wanted to go to war. I think they did this because they wanted to make America strong.  

A man who worked with the Bush group wrote a book and said this. He said the younger Bush wanted to hurt Saddam Hussein because of his father.

The war has gone on for a long time. If we leave now, more people will die. I do not think this is good.

The United Nations and America are trying to help. They want other countries to help. But this could cause more problems in the future.

The government in Iraq is not working well. The leaders are not strong. There are many groups who want power. They are fighting.

The Iraq War is hard for me to talk about. I do not know much about it.  

At first, I thought the war was pointless. We did not declare it. I think it was our way to punish Iraq for the attacks on September 11. 

I do not follow the news about the war. I do not know the details. But I know we are there to help build democracy. I also know we want oil. 

Staying in Iraq makes many people upset. It is hard to build democracy quickly. If we leave, Iraq will be angry.

I think continuing the war is not fair. We did not declare it a war. It feels like we are using guns to show our power.

I do not think we need to call it a war. Congress did not declare it.

It is hard to say if I want the war to end. Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to be safe.

The war hurt Iraq. Many children cannot go to school. Many groups fight each other.

I worry that we are changing Iraq too much. They have a different culture. We are trying to make them like the United States.

I think this will make more people hate us. The war will continue for a long time.

I do not think it is right to make this legal. I do not think a state should say it is legal. I think it is up to the churches. The Constitution says there must be a separation of church and state. This is clear.  Trying to make it legal is against the Constitution. 

People who want to make it illegal are choosing one church's beliefs over others. Most Catholics and Christians are against it.  I do not think the government should say what churches can and cannot make legal.

Separation of church and state is very important. It lets people practice their religion freely. Even if they try to change the Constitution, it is wrong. It would be one of the few changes that restrict people, not the government.

The federal government should not be involved. I do not understand why someone wants to change the Constitution. It seems like he does not like this practice because of his own religion. He is showing he prefers one religion over others. I think churches should decide, not the president or the government. There is no good reason to change the Constitution. It will not help the economy. It might even help society.

The war in Iraq. I do not think the government was honest with the people. Before the war, they said it was about the attacks on September 11th. But the wars were not really connected. The government used the anger from September 11th to start the war. The war began in 2003. 
I am against war, especially if it is a surprise attack. I think this war is like the war in Vietnam. The government should learn from past mistakes. Many American soldiers died. The government removed the Iraqi government but was not ready for what came next. There was a lot of chaos.
The US government tried to make a new government in Iraq, like they did in Vietnam. They tried to remove communists and make way for democracy. The US should have known this would be hard. It took a long time to make a good government in the US. 

The government made it seem like the war would be easy. It has been long and hard. Many American soldiers are still there. We are still training Iraqi police. It will take time. I think the government did not plan well. 

It is hard to leave Iraq now. We are the ones who removed their government. How can we leave them now? But, so many American soldiers are dying. How many is too many?
Why are we only in Iraq? Why not other countries? I think it is about oil.

They said Iraq had weapons, but they did not find any. We know North Korea has weapons, but we are not fighting them. I do not think the government is honest.

I hope the war ends soon. I hope there is peace.

I support gay marriage. I have always supported it. I think it is a private choice. Some studies show that being gay may be in a person's genes. This is not a choice. It is wrong to give people less rights because of who they love.

I think the government should not tell people who they can marry. It is a personal matter. I know gay couples in my neighborhood. They live like other families. They walk their dogs and care for each other.

President Bush wants to say marriage is only for men and women. I think this is wrong. Marriage is a personal choice.

I have read that being gay may be caused by things in a person's brain. It may not be a choice.

It is unfair that gay people cannot marry. A man and woman can marry secretly. But if two men or two women want to marry, it is a big news story. Marriage should be a private matter, not something the government controls.

The Internet is for everyone. When you put things on the Internet, everyone can see them. This can be bad.

As a helper in a dorm, I see this problem. People post things on the Internet that make others think bad things about them. If you talk about bad things, like hurting people, someone will tell the school. The school must act if they see a problem.

Sometimes people joke on the Internet. But it can be hard to know when someone is joking. The school cannot ignore a threat, no matter how small. 

The school got information about a student from his friend. The friend saw things on the student's Facebook page that worried him. The student may have meant the things as jokes, but they looked bad.

On the Internet, there is no privacy. If you do not want people to see something, do not put it on the Internet. 

The school should not look at students' Facebook pages. But if someone tells the school about a problem, the school must act.

The school should not hide and watch students. They should not pretend to be someone else.  It is wrong.

The war has gone on for too long.  The goal was good in the start.  It was to help a country have democracy.  But now the goal is not clear.  We may fight to show we are strong.  The reasons to start the war may have been bad.  George Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein.  

If the goal was to give democracy, that was good. But if there were other reasons, it was wrong. The war has gone on for many years.  

We showed our power in the start. But now the war is hurting us.  We need to help our own country.  We have problems with poverty and bad schools. We need to spend money on these things.

War costs a lot of money. We should not spend so much on war.  We need to spend money on things like schools, roads, and health care.  Many of our citizens are dying in a war we no longer have a reason to fight.

A person asked me a question about privacy on Myspace. They said someone found out private information on Myspace and stopped a bad thing from happening. I said that if you put information on the internet, many people can see it. If you are friends with someone on Myspace, they can see your profile. I think it is good that someone saw the information and helped. 

It is hard to watch everyone's Myspace all the time.  It would not be fair to look at peoples' profiles just to find trouble. 

I said that I have a Facebook account, and it worries me that people can see my information. I saw a news story about a man who used Myspace to find a girl and meet her. I would never do that.

I said that I know some people in my classes who message me on Facebook even though I don't know their real names. They know things about me, like my classes and my friends.

I try not to put too much information on Facebook, but I want to use it to talk to my friends. It is hard to know who can see what on the internet.

I heard that a school banned Myspace. I think it is strange that the school can tell students what they can and cannot do on Myspace.

I feel sad about the Iraq War. Many people did not like the war. The people in charge did not want to say they were wrong. Most people think the war was bad.

Many Iraqi people think we should leave. Most U.S. soldiers there also want to go home. It has been bad since we came. Leaving will also be hard.

The United States and the Middle East are very different. It is hard to understand each other. The government tried to bring democracy to Iraq. This was a bad idea.

Saddam was a bad leader. But, we should think about the good and bad before going to war. It was a bad idea.

I do not see a good reason to stay. I think we should leave soon. Many Iraqi people want us to leave. They know what is best for their country.

If we ask them, and they say to leave, then it is not our fault if things go wrong. We can be good if we leave. It will be better than now.

Gender different is still a problem in the United States. It is not just women. This problem is in many jobs. Women have a hard time because of the "glass roof." Even with equality, some people have a hard time working for a woman. This is because society has always made men the leaders. So, women may have the skills for a job, but the bosses may not choose them. This is a problem.

Men have this problem too. In some jobs, like being a parent, men face problems.  It is not common for a man to stay home with the children. People look down on this. Society wants men to work and be the money maker. 

In the fashion industry, men are not always taken seriously. This is because people think fashion is for women. If a man likes fashion, people wonder if he knows enough about it.

So, gender different is a problem in many jobs. To change this, we need to keep working. Women are getting more jobs in business. Men staying home with children is becoming more common. People are starting to accept these things. 

We need to show the good qualities of people who are often judged. We can't push too hard, but we need to show people that they are good. If we change too fast, people will resist.  

We have come a long way, but change takes time

They did not legalize it. They made it less of a crime. It is now like a traffic ticket.  People can get a citation. This is better than going to jail. 

Some people worry about job interviews and other problems. A drug charge can be bad.  Decriminalization helps. It costs a lot to arrest people, put them in jail, and take them to court. 

Some towns do not have enough money. They do not want to spend it on this.  

Denver is different. People there are more open to different things.  They have more money now. They can spend it on schools, old people, and people who are homeless. 

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is still bad to smoke in many places.

Alcohol is bad for driving. Marijuana can hurt people’s lives.  Everyone reacts to drugs differently. Some people can use drugs without problems. Other people have big problems.

The church has many old ways. It is good to keep old ways. But it is also good to change. Many Catholics go to church every week. They follow rules. Sometimes the church judges people who do not follow the rules exactly. The church does not accept people of other religions. My father was not Catholic. My mother was Catholic. They could not marry in the church. This is not loving others. The church teaches love, but it does not always show love.

The church tells people to do things. But the church does not always follow its own rules. The rules are old. The church keeps the old rules.

Some people think priests should marry. This might help. But it may not stop bad things from happening.  Bad things happen to children. This is a bad thing. Allowing priests to marry may not stop these things.

I am not sure about this problem yet. I can not say if one side is right or wrong. But I think this is a hard problem. It is hard to talk about church and state. It is also hard to say what marriage is. I do not know. I think all civil unions are good. I do not know if the government should say what marriage is. Marriage is a special thing. People do not get special things from the government if they are baptized. If you are married, the government should see it as a civil union. It is two people. The government should not care about the kind of marriage.

If all states agree, they should make it a law for the whole country. But a law to stop gay marriage is not good. The law should not change for this. It is important to some people, but not important enough to change the law.

I was raised in a Christian family.  Homosexuality is a hard topic for me. I have gay friends. I do not agree with this way of life. But I think it should be legal. I do not think it is a problem for the country. Each state should decide. 

Some states are Democrat, some are Republican. Democrat states support gay marriage. If you live in a Democrat state, you know how that state feels. You chose to live there. So you should respect their decision if they legalize gay marriage.

I think gay people should have the same rights as other people. So I think it should be legal, but each state should decide.

I do not think President Bush should decide for all states. He should not ban gay marriage.  He does not live in every state. 

He should let the states decide. He will leave office soon. A new president may change the law. It should be up to the states. They will live with the decision.

Myspace is a public place. If you post something on Myspace, other people can see it. School officials can see it too. If they see something bad on Myspace, they have the right to look at it. 

Even if they are not at school, they can look at it at home. 

If the school sees something on Myspace that might stop a school shooting, that is good. It is important for schools to keep students safe. 

Some people say it is wrong for schools to look at what students post on Myspace. They say it is an invasion of privacy. 

But if the school is trying to keep students safe, it is not an invasion of privacy.

It is better to be careful about what you post on the internet. 

You should not post anything that you do not want others to see.

Ok. 
The war. 

At first, I was for it.  Nine Eleven hurt me. 

I wanted to fight them. I did not think carefully.  We went to the war without a good plan.  I think we made a mistake.

Now I am against the war. I do not think it is helping.  The people there fight each other.  We can not make them stop fighting.

I do not care what happens there. I think they are not good people. They fight and they do not help each other.

We went to the war unprepared. We did not know what would happen. War is different there. They are very violent.

I think they want us to leave. We should go home. We were angry.  We wanted revenge.

The President wanted to go to war. The people wanted it too.  But we did not have a good plan.

We could not let them attack us again. But we should have planned better.

We did not know what to do there. We did not work well together. I think we were too angry.

We did not change them. They are still the same.

I think we should leave. We are not helping. We need to go home.

If the Church changed to new ways of thinking, it would not lose members.

Some people disagree with the Church because of these views.  They think the Church has the wrong ideas.

For example, the Church is against abortion. If you want an abortion, you may not feel comfortable in the Church.


The same is true for gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you may not want to be in the Church. 

I think women should be priests. I also think priests should be allowed to marry.

I do not have a problem with gay marriage. I think people are born this way. I do not think it is a choice. 

I think it is wrong to say that a man and woman can marry, but two people of the same sex can not.  

I think people should not be punished for being gay. They are born this way. It is not their fault.

I think the government should not tell people who they can marry.  It is a personal decision.

Gay marriage should be legal. There is not a good reason to say no. Some people think gay couples are bad for families. But gay couples are different. They are not the same as straight couples. It is like two sides of a coin. They are different, but they are still the same. Gay couples have rights, like taxes and health care. If a person is sick, their partner can not be with them in the hospital. This is not fair. 

Many studies show gay couples are happy. They have strong relationships. Gay couples should have the same rights as straight couples. Gay people are not asking to marry in a church. They want a legal paper from the government. The government should not stop people from getting married because of religion.

Some people think gay couples should not adopt children. They worry about how children will grow up. But gay parents can be good parents. Gay children can grow up just like other children. Some schools have special classes for children of gay parents because they are bullied. This is wrong. 

The government should make gay marriage legal in all states. The government should not make laws based on religion. It is unfair to say that one religion is better than another. Some people believe gay people are sick. This is not true. The American Psychological Association says this is wrong. People should listen to experts, not to their friends or their church.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see drugs every day. Some drugs are illegal. This does not mean they are bad. Some drugs are good for people.

Many drugs are legal. They help people. They are not bad. These drugs are good medicine.  Marijuana is illegal. But it can help people too.

Some people say marijuana is bad. They say it is like alcohol. Alcohol is bad for people if they use too much. Marijuana can also be bad if people use too much.  

I think marijuana can be good medicine. People should not be afraid of it. People should learn more about marijuana. 

Marijuana is illegal. People think it is bad. But it is not as bad as other drugs. People should not be afraid of marijuana.

The church is different now. It is not as strict. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school and saw my friends there on the weekends. We would go to church together.

Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People dress more casually. In the summer, people come in their beach clothes. Families come in late.  

The morning masses are more casual, too. People wear jeans and khakis.

I do not know about the church’s politics. 

I do not think the church could have stopped bad things from happening. Some men who are married still do bad things. It is the person, not their marriage.

Some religions allow priests to get married. If someone wants to be married and follow their faith, they could choose a different religion.

I think people are born with their sexuality. It is not a choice. It is not fair to blame the church for people's actions. If the church knew about bad things and covered them up, that is wrong. But I do not think they knew in every case.

I was ok with the idea at first. But many people felt strong sadness after the September 11 attacks. I think the Bush group went into Iraq for a reason that was not good. They said Saddam Hussein had bad weapons and was bad for the world. They said he worked with the man who hurt America on September 11. This was not true.  This makes me angry.

I think the Bush group lied to the American people. Even Colin Powell, who spoke at the United Nations, now says he did not believe the information. This is wrong. It is wrong for the leaders to lie.

I think the Bush group does not care about the rules of our country. They want to be in control. They wanted to go to war. I think they did this because they wanted to make America strong.  

A man who worked with the Bush group wrote a book and said this. He said the younger Bush wanted to hurt Saddam Hussein because of his father.

The war has gone on for a long time. If we leave now, more people will die. I do not think this is good.

The United Nations and America are trying to help. They want other countries to help. But this could cause more problems in the future.

The government in Iraq is not working well. The leaders are not strong. There are many groups who want power. They are fighting.

The Iraq War is hard for me to talk about. I do not know much about it.  

At first, I thought the war was pointless. We did not declare it. I think it was our way to punish Iraq for the attacks on September 11. 

I do not follow the news about the war. I do not know the details. But I know we are there to help build democracy. I also know we want oil. 

Staying in Iraq makes many people upset. It is hard to build democracy quickly. If we leave, Iraq will be angry.

I think continuing the war is not fair. We did not declare it a war. It feels like we are using guns to show our power.

I do not think we need to call it a war. Congress did not declare it.

It is hard to say if I want the war to end. Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to be safe.

The war hurt Iraq. Many children cannot go to school. Many groups fight each other.

I worry that we are changing Iraq too much. They have a different culture. We are trying to make them like the United States.

I think this will make more people hate us. The war will continue for a long time.

I do not think it is right to make this legal. I do not think a state should say it is legal. I think it is up to the churches. The Constitution says there must be a separation of church and state. This is clear.  Trying to make it legal is against the Constitution. 

People who want to make it illegal are choosing one church's beliefs over others. Most Catholics and Christians are against it.  I do not think the government should say what churches can and cannot make legal.

Separation of church and state is very important. It lets people practice their religion freely. Even if they try to change the Constitution, it is wrong. It would be one of the few changes that restrict people, not the government.

The federal government should not be involved. I do not understand why someone wants to change the Constitution. It seems like he does not like this practice because of his own religion. He is showing he prefers one religion over others. I think churches should decide, not the president or the government. There is no good reason to change the Constitution. It will not help the economy. It might even help society.

The war in Iraq. I do not think the government was honest with the people. Before the war, they said it was about the attacks on September 11th. But the wars were not really connected. The government used the anger from September 11th to start the war. The war began in 2003. 
I am against war, especially if it is a surprise attack. I think this war is like the war in Vietnam. The government should learn from past mistakes. Many American soldiers died. The government removed the Iraqi government but was not ready for what came next. There was a lot of chaos.
The US government tried to make a new government in Iraq, like they did in Vietnam. They tried to remove communists and make way for democracy. The US should have known this would be hard. It took a long time to make a good government in the US. 

The government made it seem like the war would be easy. It has been long and hard. Many American soldiers are still there. We are still training Iraqi police. It will take time. I think the government did not plan well. 

It is hard to leave Iraq now. We are the ones who removed their government. How can we leave them now? But, so many American soldiers are dying. How many is too many?
Why are we only in Iraq? Why not other countries? I think it is about oil.

They said Iraq had weapons, but they did not find any. We know North Korea has weapons, but we are not fighting them. I do not think the government is honest.

I hope the war ends soon. I hope there is peace.

I support gay marriage. I have always supported it. I think it is a private choice. Some studies show that being gay may be in a person's genes. This is not a choice. It is wrong to give people less rights because of who they love.

I think the government should not tell people who they can marry. It is a personal matter. I know gay couples in my neighborhood. They live like other families. They walk their dogs and care for each other.

President Bush wants to say marriage is only for men and women. I think this is wrong. Marriage is a personal choice.

I have read that being gay may be caused by things in a person's brain. It may not be a choice.

It is unfair that gay people cannot marry. A man and woman can marry secretly. But if two men or two women want to marry, it is a big news story. Marriage should be a private matter, not something the government controls.

The Internet is for everyone. When you put things on the Internet, everyone can see them. This can be bad.

As a helper in a dorm, I see this problem. People post things on the Internet that make others think bad things about them. If you talk about bad things, like hurting people, someone will tell the school. The school must act if they see a problem.

Sometimes people joke on the Internet. But it can be hard to know when someone is joking. The school cannot ignore a threat, no matter how small. 

The school got information about a student from his friend. The friend saw things on the student's Facebook page that worried him. The student may have meant the things as jokes, but they looked bad.

On the Internet, there is no privacy. If you do not want people to see something, do not put it on the Internet. 

The school should not look at students' Facebook pages. But if someone tells the school about a problem, the school must act.

The school should not hide and watch students. They should not pretend to be someone else.  It is wrong.

The war has gone on for too long.  The goal was good in the start.  It was to help a country have democracy.  But now the goal is not clear.  We may fight to show we are strong.  The reasons to start the war may have been bad.  George Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein.  

If the goal was to give democracy, that was good. But if there were other reasons, it was wrong. The war has gone on for many years.  

We showed our power in the start. But now the war is hurting us.  We need to help our own country.  We have problems with poverty and bad schools. We need to spend money on these things.

War costs a lot of money. We should not spend so much on war.  We need to spend money on things like schools, roads, and health care.  Many of our citizens are dying in a war we no longer have a reason to fight.

A person asked me a question about privacy on Myspace. They said someone found out private information on Myspace and stopped a bad thing from happening. I said that if you put information on the internet, many people can see it. If you are friends with someone on Myspace, they can see your profile. I think it is good that someone saw the information and helped. 

It is hard to watch everyone's Myspace all the time.  It would not be fair to look at peoples' profiles just to find trouble. 

I said that I have a Facebook account, and it worries me that people can see my information. I saw a news story about a man who used Myspace to find a girl and meet her. I would never do that.

I said that I know some people in my classes who message me on Facebook even though I don't know their real names. They know things about me, like my classes and my friends.

I try not to put too much information on Facebook, but I want to use it to talk to my friends. It is hard to know who can see what on the internet.

I heard that a school banned Myspace. I think it is strange that the school can tell students what they can and cannot do on Myspace.

I feel sad about the Iraq War. Many people did not like the war. The people in charge did not want to say they were wrong. Most people think the war was bad.

Many Iraqi people think we should leave. Most U.S. soldiers there also want to go home. It has been bad since we came. Leaving will also be hard.

The United States and the Middle East are very different. It is hard to understand each other. The government tried to bring democracy to Iraq. This was a bad idea.

Saddam was a bad leader. But, we should think about the good and bad before going to war. It was a bad idea.

I do not see a good reason to stay. I think we should leave soon. Many Iraqi people want us to leave. They know what is best for their country.

If we ask them, and they say to leave, then it is not our fault if things go wrong. We can be good if we leave. It will be better than now.

Gender different is still a problem in the United States. It is not just women. This problem is in many jobs. Women have a hard time because of the "glass roof." Even with equality, some people have a hard time working for a woman. This is because society has always made men the leaders. So, women may have the skills for a job, but the bosses may not choose them. This is a problem.

Men have this problem too. In some jobs, like being a parent, men face problems.  It is not common for a man to stay home with the children. People look down on this. Society wants men to work and be the money maker. 

In the fashion industry, men are not always taken seriously. This is because people think fashion is for women. If a man likes fashion, people wonder if he knows enough about it.

So, gender different is a problem in many jobs. To change this, we need to keep working. Women are getting more jobs in business. Men staying home with children is becoming more common. People are starting to accept these things. 

We need to show the good qualities of people who are often judged. We can't push too hard, but we need to show people that they are good. If we change too fast, people will resist.  

We have come a long way, but change takes time

They did not legalize it. They made it less of a crime. It is now like a traffic ticket.  People can get a citation. This is better than going to jail. 

Some people worry about job interviews and other problems. A drug charge can be bad.  Decriminalization helps. It costs a lot to arrest people, put them in jail, and take them to court. 

Some towns do not have enough money. They do not want to spend it on this.  

Denver is different. People there are more open to different things.  They have more money now. They can spend it on schools, old people, and people who are homeless. 

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is still bad to smoke in many places.

Alcohol is bad for driving. Marijuana can hurt people’s lives.  Everyone reacts to drugs differently. Some people can use drugs without problems. Other people have big problems.

The church has many old ways. It is good to keep old ways. But it is also good to change. Many Catholics go to church every week. They follow rules. Sometimes the church judges people who do not follow the rules exactly. The church does not accept people of other religions. My father was not Catholic. My mother was Catholic. They could not marry in the church. This is not loving others. The church teaches love, but it does not always show love.

The church tells people to do things. But the church does not always follow its own rules. The rules are old. The church keeps the old rules.

Some people think priests should marry. This might help. But it may not stop bad things from happening.  Bad things happen to children. This is a bad thing. Allowing priests to marry may not stop these things.

I am not sure about this problem yet. I can not say if one side is right or wrong. But I think this is a hard problem. It is hard to talk about church and state. It is also hard to say what marriage is. I do not know. I think all civil unions are good. I do not know if the government should say what marriage is. Marriage is a special thing. People do not get special things from the government if they are baptized. If you are married, the government should see it as a civil union. It is two people. The government should not care about the kind of marriage.

If all states agree, they should make it a law for the whole country. But a law to stop gay marriage is not good. The law should not change for this. It is important to some people, but not important enough to change the law.

I was raised in a Christian family.  Homosexuality is a hard topic for me. I have gay friends. I do not agree with this way of life. But I think it should be legal. I do not think it is a problem for the country. Each state should decide. 

Some states are Democrat, some are Republican. Democrat states support gay marriage. If you live in a Democrat state, you know how that state feels. You chose to live there. So you should respect their decision if they legalize gay marriage.

I think gay people should have the same rights as other people. So I think it should be legal, but each state should decide.

I do not think President Bush should decide for all states. He should not ban gay marriage.  He does not live in every state. 

He should let the states decide. He will leave office soon. A new president may change the law. It should be up to the states. They will live with the decision.

Myspace is a public place. If you post something on Myspace, other people can see it. School officials can see it too. If they see something bad on Myspace, they have the right to look at it. 

Even if they are not at school, they can look at it at home. 

If the school sees something on Myspace that might stop a school shooting, that is good. It is important for schools to keep students safe. 

Some people say it is wrong for schools to look at what students post on Myspace. They say it is an invasion of privacy. 

But if the school is trying to keep students safe, it is not an invasion of privacy.

It is better to be careful about what you post on the internet. 

You should not post anything that you do not want others to see.

Ok. 
The war. 

At first, I was for it.  Nine Eleven hurt me. 

I wanted to fight them. I did not think carefully.  We went to the war without a good plan.  I think we made a mistake.

Now I am against the war. I do not think it is helping.  The people there fight each other.  We can not make them stop fighting.

I do not care what happens there. I think they are not good people. They fight and they do not help each other.

We went to the war unprepared. We did not know what would happen. War is different there. They are very violent.

I think they want us to leave. We should go home. We were angry.  We wanted revenge.

The President wanted to go to war. The people wanted it too.  But we did not have a good plan.

We could not let them attack us again. But we should have planned better.

We did not know what to do there. We did not work well together. I think we were too angry.

We did not change them. They are still the same.

I think we should leave. We are not helping. We need to go home.

The Catholic Church does need to change.  Some people say the Church is losing members. This is because the Church does not accept many things. For example, the Church does not accept gay marriage, abortion, or birth control. The Church has strong views on these things. But these views are old. If the Church changed to new ways of thinking, it would not lose members.

Some people disagree with the Church because of these views.  They think the Church has the wrong ideas.

For example, the Church is against abortion. If you want an abortion, you may not feel comfortable in the Church.


The same is true for gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you may not want to be in the Church. 

I think women should be priests. I also think priests should be allowed to marry.

I do not have a problem with gay marriage. I think people are born this way. I do not think it is a choice. 

I think it is wrong to say that a man and woman can marry, but two people of the same sex can not.  

I think people should not be punished for being gay. They are born this way. It is not their fault.

I think the government should not tell people who they can marry.  It is a personal decision.

Gay marriage should be legal. There is not a good reason to say no. Some people think gay couples are bad for families. But gay couples are different. They are not the same as straight couples. It is like two sides of a coin. They are different, but they are still the same. Gay couples have rights, like taxes and health care. If a person is sick, their partner can not be with them in the hospital. This is not fair. 

Many studies show gay couples are happy. They have strong relationships. Gay couples should have the same rights as straight couples. Gay people are not asking to marry in a church. They want a legal paper from the government. The government should not stop people from getting married because of religion.

Some people think gay couples should not adopt children. They worry about how children will grow up. But gay parents can be good parents. Gay children can grow up just like other children. Some schools have special classes for children of gay parents because they are bullied. This is wrong. 

The government should make gay marriage legal in all states. The government should not make laws based on religion. It is unfair to say that one religion is better than another. Some people believe gay people are sick. This is not true. The American Psychological Association says this is wrong. People should listen to experts, not to their friends or their church.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see drugs every day. Some drugs are illegal. This does not mean they are bad. Some drugs are good for people.

Many drugs are legal. They help people. They are not bad. These drugs are good medicine.  Marijuana is illegal. But it can help people too.

Some people say marijuana is bad. They say it is like alcohol. Alcohol is bad for people if they use too much. Marijuana can also be bad if people use too much.  

I think marijuana can be good medicine. People should not be afraid of it. People should learn more about marijuana. 

Marijuana is illegal. People think it is bad. But it is not as bad as other drugs. People should not be afraid of marijuana.

The church is different now. It is not as strict. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school and saw my friends there on the weekends. We would go to church together.

Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People dress more casually. In the summer, people come in their beach clothes. Families come in late.  

The morning masses are more casual, too. People wear jeans and khakis.

I do not know about the church’s politics. 

I do not think the church could have stopped bad things from happening. Some men who are married still do bad things. It is the person, not their marriage.

Some religions allow priests to get married. If someone wants to be married and follow their faith, they could choose a different religion.

I think people are born with their sexuality. It is not a choice. It is not fair to blame the church for people's actions. If the church knew about bad things and covered them up, that is wrong. But I do not think they knew in every case.

I was ok with the idea at first. But many people felt strong sadness after the September 11 attacks. I think the Bush group went into Iraq for a reason that was not good. They said Saddam Hussein had bad weapons and was bad for the world. They said he worked with the man who hurt America on September 11. This was not true.  This makes me angry.

I think the Bush group lied to the American people. Even Colin Powell, who spoke at the United Nations, now says he did not believe the information. This is wrong. It is wrong for the leaders to lie.

I think the Bush group does not care about the rules of our country. They want to be in control. They wanted to go to war. I think they did this because they wanted to make America strong.  

A man who worked with the Bush group wrote a book and said this. He said the younger Bush wanted to hurt Saddam Hussein because of his father.

The war has gone on for a long time. If we leave now, more people will die. I do not think this is good.

The United Nations and America are trying to help. They want other countries to help. But this could cause more problems in the future.

The government in Iraq is not working well. The leaders are not strong. There are many groups who want power. They are fighting.

The Iraq War is hard for me to talk about. I do not know much about it.  

At first, I thought the war was pointless. We did not declare it. I think it was our way to punish Iraq for the attacks on September 11. 

I do not follow the news about the war. I do not know the details. But I know we are there to help build democracy. I also know we want oil. 

Staying in Iraq makes many people upset. It is hard to build democracy quickly. If we leave, Iraq will be angry.

I think continuing the war is not fair. We did not declare it a war. It feels like we are using guns to show our power.

I do not think we need to call it a war. Congress did not declare it.

It is hard to say if I want the war to end. Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to be safe.

The war hurt Iraq. Many children cannot go to school. Many groups fight each other.

I worry that we are changing Iraq too much. They have a different culture. We are trying to make them like the United States.

I think this will make more people hate us. The war will continue for a long time.

I do not think it is right to make this legal. I do not think a state should say it is legal. I think it is up to the churches. The Constitution says there must be a separation of church and state. This is clear.  Trying to make it legal is against the Constitution. 

People who want to make it illegal are choosing one church's beliefs over others. Most Catholics and Christians are against it.  I do not think the government should say what churches can and cannot make legal.

Separation of church and state is very important. It lets people practice their religion freely. Even if they try to change the Constitution, it is wrong. It would be one of the few changes that restrict people, not the government.

The federal government should not be involved. I do not understand why someone wants to change the Constitution. It seems like he does not like this practice because of his own religion. He is showing he prefers one religion over others. I think churches should decide, not the president or the government. There is no good reason to change the Constitution. It will not help the economy. It might even help society.

The war in Iraq. I do not think the government was honest with the people. Before the war, they said it was about the attacks on September 11th. But the wars were not really connected. The government used the anger from September 11th to start the war. The war began in 2003. 
I am against war, especially if it is a surprise attack. I think this war is like the war in Vietnam. The government should learn from past mistakes. Many American soldiers died. The government removed the Iraqi government but was not ready for what came next. There was a lot of chaos.
The US government tried to make a new government in Iraq, like they did in Vietnam. They tried to remove communists and make way for democracy. The US should have known this would be hard. It took a long time to make a good government in the US. 

The government made it seem like the war would be easy. It has been long and hard. Many American soldiers are still there. We are still training Iraqi police. It will take time. I think the government did not plan well. 

It is hard to leave Iraq now. We are the ones who removed their government. How can we leave them now? But, so many American soldiers are dying. How many is too many?
Why are we only in Iraq? Why not other countries? I think it is about oil.

They said Iraq had weapons, but they did not find any. We know North Korea has weapons, but we are not fighting them. I do not think the government is honest.

I hope the war ends soon. I hope there is peace.

I support gay marriage. I have always supported it. I think it is a private choice. Some studies show that being gay may be in a person's genes. This is not a choice. It is wrong to give people less rights because of who they love.

I think the government should not tell people who they can marry. It is a personal matter. I know gay couples in my neighborhood. They live like other families. They walk their dogs and care for each other.

President Bush wants to say marriage is only for men and women. I think this is wrong. Marriage is a personal choice.

I have read that being gay may be caused by things in a person's brain. It may not be a choice.

It is unfair that gay people cannot marry. A man and woman can marry secretly. But if two men or two women want to marry, it is a big news story. Marriage should be a private matter, not something the government controls.

The Internet is for everyone. When you put things on the Internet, everyone can see them. This can be bad.

As a helper in a dorm, I see this problem. People post things on the Internet that make others think bad things about them. If you talk about bad things, like hurting people, someone will tell the school. The school must act if they see a problem.

Sometimes people joke on the Internet. But it can be hard to know when someone is joking. The school cannot ignore a threat, no matter how small. 

The school got information about a student from his friend. The friend saw things on the student's Facebook page that worried him. The student may have meant the things as jokes, but they looked bad.

On the Internet, there is no privacy. If you do not want people to see something, do not put it on the Internet. 

The school should not look at students' Facebook pages. But if someone tells the school about a problem, the school must act.

The school should not hide and watch students. They should not pretend to be someone else.  It is wrong.

The war has gone on for too long.  The goal was good in the start.  It was to help a country have democracy.  But now the goal is not clear.  We may fight to show we are strong.  The reasons to start the war may have been bad.  George Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein.  

If the goal was to give democracy, that was good. But if there were other reasons, it was wrong. The war has gone on for many years.  

We showed our power in the start. But now the war is hurting us.  We need to help our own country.  We have problems with poverty and bad schools. We need to spend money on these things.

War costs a lot of money. We should not spend so much on war.  We need to spend money on things like schools, roads, and health care.  Many of our citizens are dying in a war we no longer have a reason to fight.

A person asked me a question about privacy on Myspace. They said someone found out private information on Myspace and stopped a bad thing from happening. I said that if you put information on the internet, many people can see it. If you are friends with someone on Myspace, they can see your profile. I think it is good that someone saw the information and helped. 

It is hard to watch everyone's Myspace all the time.  It would not be fair to look at peoples' profiles just to find trouble. 

I said that I have a Facebook account, and it worries me that people can see my information. I saw a news story about a man who used Myspace to find a girl and meet her. I would never do that.

I said that I know some people in my classes who message me on Facebook even though I don't know their real names. They know things about me, like my classes and my friends.

I try not to put too much information on Facebook, but I want to use it to talk to my friends. It is hard to know who can see what on the internet.

I heard that a school banned Myspace. I think it is strange that the school can tell students what they can and cannot do on Myspace.

I feel sad about the Iraq War. Many people did not like the war. The people in charge did not want to say they were wrong. Most people think the war was bad.

Many Iraqi people think we should leave. Most U.S. soldiers there also want to go home. It has been bad since we came. Leaving will also be hard.

The United States and the Middle East are very different. It is hard to understand each other. The government tried to bring democracy to Iraq. This was a bad idea.

Saddam was a bad leader. But, we should think about the good and bad before going to war. It was a bad idea.

I do not see a good reason to stay. I think we should leave soon. Many Iraqi people want us to leave. They know what is best for their country.

If we ask them, and they say to leave, then it is not our fault if things go wrong. We can be good if we leave. It will be better than now.

Gender different is still a problem in the United States. It is not just women. This problem is in many jobs. Women have a hard time because of the "glass roof." Even with equality, some people have a hard time working for a woman. This is because society has always made men the leaders. So, women may have the skills for a job, but the bosses may not choose them. This is a problem.

Men have this problem too. In some jobs, like being a parent, men face problems.  It is not common for a man to stay home with the children. People look down on this. Society wants men to work and be the money maker. 

In the fashion industry, men are not always taken seriously. This is because people think fashion is for women. If a man likes fashion, people wonder if he knows enough about it.

So, gender different is a problem in many jobs. To change this, we need to keep working. Women are getting more jobs in business. Men staying home with children is becoming more common. People are starting to accept these things. 

We need to show the good qualities of people who are often judged. We can't push too hard, but we need to show people that they are good. If we change too fast, people will resist.  

We have come a long way, but change takes time

They did not legalize it. They made it less of a crime. It is now like a traffic ticket.  People can get a citation. This is better than going to jail. 

Some people worry about job interviews and other problems. A drug charge can be bad.  Decriminalization helps. It costs a lot to arrest people, put them in jail, and take them to court. 

Some towns do not have enough money. They do not want to spend it on this.  

Denver is different. People there are more open to different things.  They have more money now. They can spend it on schools, old people, and people who are homeless. 

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is still bad to smoke in many places.

Alcohol is bad for driving. Marijuana can hurt people’s lives.  Everyone reacts to drugs differently. Some people can use drugs without problems. Other people have big problems.

The church has many old ways. It is good to keep old ways. But it is also good to change. Many Catholics go to church every week. They follow rules. Sometimes the church judges people who do not follow the rules exactly. The church does not accept people of other religions. My father was not Catholic. My mother was Catholic. They could not marry in the church. This is not loving others. The church teaches love, but it does not always show love.

The church tells people to do things. But the church does not always follow its own rules. The rules are old. The church keeps the old rules.

Some people think priests should marry. This might help. But it may not stop bad things from happening.  Bad things happen to children. This is a bad thing. Allowing priests to marry may not stop these things.

I am not sure about this problem yet. I can not say if one side is right or wrong. But I think this is a hard problem. It is hard to talk about church and state. It is also hard to say what marriage is. I do not know. I think all civil unions are good. I do not know if the government should say what marriage is. Marriage is a special thing. People do not get special things from the government if they are baptized. If you are married, the government should see it as a civil union. It is two people. The government should not care about the kind of marriage.

If all states agree, they should make it a law for the whole country. But a law to stop gay marriage is not good. The law should not change for this. It is important to some people, but not important enough to change the law.

I was raised in a Christian family.  Homosexuality is a hard topic for me. I have gay friends. I do not agree with this way of life. But I think it should be legal. I do not think it is a problem for the country. Each state should decide. 

Some states are Democrat, some are Republican. Democrat states support gay marriage. If you live in a Democrat state, you know how that state feels. You chose to live there. So you should respect their decision if they legalize gay marriage.

I think gay people should have the same rights as other people. So I think it should be legal, but each state should decide.

I do not think President Bush should decide for all states. He should not ban gay marriage.  He does not live in every state. 

He should let the states decide. He will leave office soon. A new president may change the law. It should be up to the states. They will live with the decision.

Myspace is a public place. If you post something on Myspace, other people can see it. School officials can see it too. If they see something bad on Myspace, they have the right to look at it. 

Even if they are not at school, they can look at it at home. 

If the school sees something on Myspace that might stop a school shooting, that is good. It is important for schools to keep students safe. 

Some people say it is wrong for schools to look at what students post on Myspace. They say it is an invasion of privacy. 

But if the school is trying to keep students safe, it is not an invasion of privacy.

It is better to be careful about what you post on the internet. 

You should not post anything that you do not want others to see.

The war. 

At first, I was for it.  Nine Eleven hurt me. 

I wanted to fight them. I did not think carefully.  We went to the war without a good plan.  I think we made a mistake.

Now I am against the war. I do not think it is helping.  The people there fight each other.  We can not make them stop fighting.

I do not care what happens there. I think they are not good people. They fight and they do not help each other.

We went to the war unprepared. We did not know what would happen. War is different there. They are very violent.

I think they want us to leave. We should go home. We were angry.  We wanted revenge.

The President wanted to go to war. The people wanted it too.  But we did not have a good plan.

We could not let them attack us again. But we should have planned better.

We did not know what to do there. We did not work well together. I think we were too angry.

We did not change them. They are still the same.

I think we should leave. We are not helping. We need to go home.
